FuncDef: This command specifies the Vendor-Identifying Vendor Option to match. Option 60 is encoded as Type-Length-Value (TLV). Thehex-stringportion of Option 60 in the received DHCP request is used for matching. Only the first 32 bytes can be defined here. If Option 60 from the message is longer, those bytes are ignored.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the hexadecimal format for this option. Values-0x0 to 0xFFFFFFFF(maximum 64 hex nibbles).
Specifies the string format for this option, up to 32 characters.
